entry.title: Russia Scrambles to Reconnect Supply Lines to Crimea After Bridge Explosion
entry.content: Moscow raced to restore transportation links to the annexed peninsula, while Russian rockets slammed into the southeastern Ukrainian city of Zaporizhzhia overnight, killing at least 17 people.

entry.title: Thailand Mass Shooting Victims Included Children as Young as 2
entry.content: One 4-year-old loved jokes and classical Thai dancing. A 2-year-old, nicknamed the “Captain” loved pizza. At the base of one casket, lay a toy dinosaur and plastic trucks.

entry.title: Himars Transform the Battle for Ukraine---and Modern Warfare
entry.content: The mobile, high-precision U.S. rocket system is thwarting Russia’s invasion as it revolutionizes military strategy.
